artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. Strips of brown leather and brown nylon/cotton? for weft. No label.  Sample known to be Leather Cloth (brown)
